nodes.text: A side-car was a device that could be installed on the 88-R Nightscreamer speeder bike. It increased the transport-space of the bike, allowing for cargo or an additional passenger.

Sometime before the Battle of Yavin, the bounty hunter veteran Chentu Chek mentioned the side-car in his description of the Nightscreamer in his chapter Tools of the Trade, which was published in the Bounty Hunters Guild Handbook
